summary: In 1950s, a windowed mother falls for an Alaskan gold miner, so they move to the Alaskan wilderness and try to find gold and happiness.
cast: Jill Eikenberry|Art Hindle|Ari Magder|Graham Greene|Davina Whitehouse|Tony Groser|June Bishop|Helen Moulder|Sam Tyson-Hogg|Christopher Douglas
title: Oro bruto
